mapper.select: select b.name ,b.title, b.phone, a.* from express_delivery a, proprietor b where b.id=a.proprietor_id and b.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') and b.phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%') ORDER BY a.id DESC limit #{pageNum},#{pageSize};
select count(*) from express_delivery a, proprietor b where b.id=a.proprietor_id and b.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') and b.phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%');
mapper.update: Update express_delivery set serviceman=#{serviceman}, status=#{status} where id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT into express_delivery (proprietor_id, delivery_type, delivery_location, delivery_code,create_date,status) VALUES (#{proprietorId},#{deliveryType},#{deliveryLocation},#{deliveryCode},#{createDate},#{status});
mapper.select: SELECT * from express_delivery where proprietor_id = #{proprietorId} ORDER BY id DESC;
